name: pnp-da-todo-tasks-graphapi-plugin
title: Retrieve and create my ToDo tasks - No code!
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to retrieve and create my ToDo tasks.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to build a declarative agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot that allows you to retrieve and create ToDo tasks. The agent is built using the Microsoft Teams Toolkit.

thumbnails.alt: Create a new task in To-Do list
